name: 10.23 "Bar Wars VI: This Time It's For Real Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who had a cameo appearance in the cold opening?
questions.explanation:
John Kerry.

	John Kerry was a Massachusetts senator from 1985-2013. In 2013 he became the 68th United States Secretary of State.

questions.text: To whom did Gary sell the Olde Towne Tavern?
questions.explanation:
Frank.

	Sam told the gang at Cheers this information. Norm was happy because it meant he no longer had a bar tab at Gary's. This information lacked continuity. The bar had different owners over the years, but Norm always had an existing bar tab.

questions.text: What did the guys do to the new owners of Gary's Olde Towne Tavern?
options: Threw a brick threw a window
questions.explanation:
TP'd the bar's front.

	They wrote in soap "regards from your friends at Cheers", Norm threw a couple boxes of Cheers matches in. Cliff stuck his head in the door and yelled, "Cheers rules!"

questions.text: How did Frank respond to the prank Cheers pulled?
questions.correct: He blew off the door at Cheers.
options: He set the bar on fire.
questions.explanation:
He blew off the door at Cheers.

	They expected a novice prank thinking these guys were rookies. It turned out Frank was a part of the mob.

Angel of Death.

	The police officer said his name was Frank "the Angel of Death" Carpaccio. The police officer told Sam he could file charges, but people who did that in the past didn't turn out so well after Frank dealt with them.

questions.text: Who decided to go on vacation for a couple of weeks?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	He just finished telling the others not to be afraid because this was different than what they saw on "The Godfather" movies. Then he informed them that he, Lilith, and Frederick had a vacation planned. Lilith had no idea what he was talking about.

Cliff.

	Cliff told Woody that being afraid of clowns is normal. The fear of clowns is coulrophobia.

questions.text: Why did Carla say an agent would have a fighting chance against her kids?
questions.explanation:
He had a gun.

	Carla's children are not very good children. They stay out all hours of the night, steal and have even been to jail.

questions.text: When the others were shipped out for safety reasons, who stayed behind?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	He said his whole life was his bar and he wasn't going to give it up. He told Woody to go when Woody said he'd stay with Sam.

questions.text: What did Sam say to the gang, that was found left in the middle of nowhere?
questions.explanation:
Gotcha.

	Sam set the entire thing up to get back at them for the Halloween prank. He said he had to take out a loan and would be in debt for years.
